澨澨澨

澨字的基本解释

澨
shì
堤岸。
〔澨水〕古河名。
水边地，涯岸：“夕济兮西澨。”

澨字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shì］
［《廣韻》時制切，去祭，禪。］
(1)水滨。
(2)大堤。
(3)水名。在湖北省境内。
[②]［cuó］
象声词。万啄声。

澨字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　澨； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页653第05
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?時制切，音誓。【說文】?增水邊，土人所止者。【楚辭·九歌】夕濟兮西澨。　又水名。【書·禹貢】過三澨，至于大別。　又【集韻】以制切，音曳。義同。　又【韻補】叶食列切，音舌。【江淹·擬古詩】身名竟誰辨，圖史終磨滅。且汎桂水湖，映月遊海澨。

澨字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
澨字的起名意思

指水边，堤岸，也指水名。

shore
Basic explanation of words
shore
shì
embankment.
〔Yushui〕 The name of the ancient river.
On the edge of the water, Ya An: "Xiji is in the west."
shore
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shì］
["Guangyun" time cut, go to sacrifice, Zen. ]
(1) Waterfront.
(2) The embankment.
(3) Water name. In Hubei Province.
[②]［cuó］
Onomatopoeia. Wan pecked.
shore
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　澨; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 653 05
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Time system cutting, sound oath. [Said the text]? By adding water, the natives stop. [Songs of the Chu·Nine Songs] Xiji Xiyue.　Also known as water. 【Book·Yugong】After Sanyue, as for the big difference.　 [Ji Yun] to make cutting, sound drag. The same meaning.　[Rhyme tonic] Leaf-food row cut, sound tongue. [Jiang Yan·Imitated Ancient Poems] Who knows the name of the body, the history of the picture will eventually be wiped out. And pan Guishui Lake, mirroring the moon to swim in the sea.
shore

Old glyph
shore
Name meaning
Refers to the water's edge, embankment, and also the name of the water.
shì
I сущ.
1) насыпь (на берегу реки)
2) * южн. диал. берег реки; отмель
西澨 западный берег
II собств. геогр.
(сокр. вм. 澨水) река Шишуй (в пров. Хубэй)
